title: Git & Versioning
text: Keep development separate from production. Roll-back at any time. Migrate development changes to production environment

title: Ubiquitous Hot Reload
text: Built by Clojure devs who are used to the fast feedback from change to result. Hot Reload Everywhere

title: Live preview of the local code
text: Develop in the IDE of your choice and instantly see changes in the cloud

title: Connect your IDE
text: Do demanding coding in your IDE and connect it to the system

title: Language Server
text: Context-aware autocomplete. The system intakes the context from the current environment, Slack and Notion Aware of database, components, everything

title: Docs in your IDE
text: In-context guidance and faster problem solving
